title: Thanksgiving Rammus
body:
Thanks-giving Rammus, where his shell is a cooked turkey. That's about it. Simple, hilarious.

[Beautiful concept art](http://i.imgur.com/ZxpBVMu.png)

replies.body: Better if you have pumpkin rammus. His shell is a sideways and when he rolls you see a pumpkin rolling towards you. His ult is just pumpkin inners splashing out. His armor thing is the jackolantern glow
Or Thanksgiving Teemo. Where Rito dresses Teemo up in a Turkey suit and makes an event where everyone in the game hunts the teemo player. Also, Pilgrim {{champion:4}}  op.
LOL! they should seriously make this skin no jokes :D!

HAHAHAHAHAHA i don't understand the downvotes...

This is amazing! :'D
